mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sys_schedule_job (job_class, job_group, job_name, trigger_name, trigger_group, cron_expr, status, delete_flag, start_time, created_time) values (#{jobClass}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobName}, #{triggerName}, #{triggerGroup}, #{cronExpr}, #{status}, #{deleteFlag}, #{startTime}, #{createdTime})
